'''Everbloom Violet''' is a [[Character Event Wish-2]] in [[Version 3.7]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2023-05-24 11:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2023-06-13 17:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Astute Amusement" [[Yae Miko]] ({{Electro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Cat Upon the Eaves" [[Kirara]] ({{Dendro}}), "Stage Lucida" [[Yun Jin]] ({{Geo}}), and "Frozen Ardor" [[Chongyun]] ({{Cryo}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
